directions: Mix together the tomato soup, vegetable juice cocktail, Worcestershire sauce, onion flakes, dried parsley, horseradish, Dijon mustard, garlic powder, black pepper, tapioca, and water in a slow cooker. Set the cooker on Low, and cook until thickened, 3 to 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup (such as Campbell's®)
1 (46 ounce) can tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8®)
3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
2 teaspoons garlic powder, or to taste
title: Tangy Horseradish Tomato Sauce For Meatballs
